General Election - Nov. 4, 2025
-------------------------------



The general election for the offices of City Council Mayor, Council Place #1 and Council Place #2 will be held Tuesday, Nov. 4, 2025, at the Runnels County Election Office, 600 Strong Ave. The deadline to file a candidate application is 5 p.m. Monday, Aug. 18, 2025.

Mayor - Vacant(term expires in 2025)

Place #1 - Darlene Kelly (term expires in 2025)

Place #2 - Richard Morrish (term expires in 2025)

Place #3 - Ryan Lange (term expires in 2026)

Place #4 - Steve Gray (term expires in 2026)
